name: Bugberry Bounty
description:
Tasty bugberries  like to hide behind rocks.
You have to  catch and deliver them to complete the bounty!

Made  for Trijam 123 with the theme "Hide or get caught!".

*There is a known bug where you can drag objects off the side of the screen.
If you don't do that it doesn't affect the game.*

How to play (there is a tutorial when you click start from the main menu):
- Drag and drop rocks to reveal berries hiding behind them.
- Drag and drop berries below the fence at the bottom.
- The bounty (which berries are needed to win) is shown at the top.
- The timer is also shown on the top, if it runs out you lose.
